      reads a series of names from the given file and adds each teamMember to the system creates and id that is incremented with each teamMember creates a TeamMember object every time a full name is read doesn't assign to projects returns a TeamMemberList object containing all the TeamMembers that are now in the system

      • getTeamMemberList

        public TeamMemberList getTeamMemberList​(Project project,
                                        Requirement requirement)
        checks if the given requirement exists within the given project if yes, returns a TeamMemberList object, else throws an exception
        Specified by:
        getTeamMemberList in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Parameters:

        requirement - a requirement chosen from the chosen project's RequirementList
        Returns:

      • getTeamMemberList

        public TeamMemberList getTeamMemberList​(Project project,
                                        Requirement requirement,
                                        Task task)
        checks if the given project contains the given requirement if no, throws an exception, if yes checks if the requirement contains the given task if no, throws an exception if yes returns a TeamMemberList object
        Specified by:
        getTeamMemberList in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Parameters:
        project - a project chosen from the ProjectList
        requirement - a requirement chosen from the project's RequirementList
        task - a task chosen from the requirement's TaskList
        Returns:
        a TeamMember object containing the list of the team members working on the given task

      • getWorkingTasks

        public int getWorkingTasks​(TeamMember teamMember)
        the method searches through all the started projects, requirements and tasks and if the team member is working there, the counter of the working tasks will increase
        Specified by:
        getWorkingTasks in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the selected team member
        Returns:
        the number of tasks the member is working on

      • getMostFrequentTeamMember

        public TeamMember getMostFrequentTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Specified by:
        getMostFrequentTeamMember in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Parameters:
        teamMember - a given teamMember selected by the user
        Returns:
        another teamMember with the most interactions with the given one or null if the teamMember has not worked on a project yet loops through all the projects within the projectList, all the requirements of every project, all the tasks of every requirement all the teamMembers of every task that the given teamMember has worked on and creates a hashmap with all the other teamMembers in the list as key and the number of lists they were in. the teamMember with the maximum number value is returned

      • getProductivity

        public double getProductivity​(TeamMember teamMember)
        returns a double number that represents the productivity of the selected teamMember
        Specified by:
        getProductivity in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Parameters:
        teamMember - - the selected teamMember loops through all the tasks within all the requirements within all the projects that the teamMember is working on and calculates the sum of the total hours worked and the total number of tasks the teamMember has worked on
        Returns:
        sum of total hours worked divided by the total number of tasks, multiplied by 100 to show the percentange

      • addTeamMembersToTheSystem

        public TeamMemberList addTeamMembersToTheSystem()
                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        reads a series of names from the given file and adds each teamMember to the system creates and id that is incremented with each teamMember creates a TeamMember object every time a full name is read doesn't assign to projects returns a TeamMemberList object containing all the TeamMembers that are now in the system
        Specified by:
        addTeamMembersToTheSystem in interface IProjectManagementModel
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
